#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define all(c) c.begin(),c.end()
#define sz(c) c.size()
const int SIZE = 1e5+1;
typedef long long int ll;
const ll mod = 1e9+7;
int arr[SIZE];
int n;

ll pow7(int y)
{
ll res=1,x=7;
while(y)
{
    if(y&1)
    {
        res*=x;
        res%=mod;
    }
    x*=x;
    x%=mod;
    y>>=1;
}
return res;
}



int main()
{
   ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
   cin.tie(0);
   int tt;
   int n;
   cin>>tt;
   while(tt--)
   {
       cin>>n;
       cout<<pow7(n)<<endl;
   }
   return 0;
}
